text: وَلَوۡ جَعَلۡنَٰهُ مَلَكٗا لَّجَعَلۡنَٰهُ رَجُلٗا وَلَلَبَسۡنَا عَلَيۡهِم مَّا يَلۡبِسُونَ

translation.en: And if We had made him an angel, We would have made him [appear as] a man, and We would have covered them with that in which they cover themselves
translation.id: Dan sekiranya Rasul itu Kami jadikan (dari) malaikat, pastilah Kami jadikan dia (berwujud) laki-laki, dan (dengan demikian) pasti Kami akan menjadikan mereka tetap ragu sebagaimana kini mereka ragu
